Message.Name: MSG_MSGBOX_TITLE
Message.Value: Haruka

Message.Name: MSG_ALREADY_LOGGEDIN
Message.Value: Do you want to discard changes and log out?

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_PORTNO
Message.Value: Port number must be 1 to 65535.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_ADDRESS
Message.Value: Address length must be 1 to {0}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TOTAL_LIMIT
Message.Value: Total Limit must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_MAX_FILE_COUNT
Message.Value: Max File Count must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_SOFT_LIMIT
Message.Value: Soft Limit must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_HARD_LIMIT
Message.Value: Hard Limit must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_LOG_PARAM_RESTRICT
Message.Value: Soft Limit must be smaller than or equal Hard Limit.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TARGET_DEVICE_ID
Message.Value: Target device ID must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME
Message.Value: Target device name length must be less than or equal {0}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_MaxRecvDataSegmentLength
Message.Value: MaxRecvDataSegmentLength must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_MaxBurstLength
Message.Value: MaxBurstLength must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_FirstBurstLength
Message.Value: FirstBurstLength must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_DefaultTime2Wait
Message.Value: DefaultTime2Wait must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_DefaultTime2Retain
Message.Value: DefaultTime2Retain must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_MaxOutstandingR2T
Message.Value: MaxOutstandingR2T must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_NetworkPortalID
Message.Value: NetworkPortalID must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TargetAddress
Message.Value: TargetAddress length must be less than or equal {0}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_ReceiveBufferSize
Message.Value: ReceiveBufferSize must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_SendBufferSize
Message.Value: SendBufferSize must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TARGET_GROUP_ID
Message.Value: Target group ID must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TARGET_GROUP_NAME
Message.Value: Target group name length must be less than or equal {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TARGET_ID
Message.Value: Target ID must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TARGET_NAME
Message.Value: Invalid target name. It must conform iSCSI name constraints.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TARGET_ALIAS
Message.Value: Target device name length must be less than or equal {0}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_INITIATOR_USER_NAME
Message.Value: Invalid initiator user name. The string length must be 1 to {0}. And the characters allowed in the string are a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and, dot(.), hyphen(-), colon(:).

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_INITIATOR_PASSWORD
Message.Value: Invalid initiator password. The string length must be 1 to {0}. And the characters allowed in the string are a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and, dot(.), hyphen(-), colon(:).

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TARGET_USER_NAME
Message.Value: Invalid target user name. The string length must be 1 to {0}. And the characters allowed in the string are a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and, dot(.), hyphen(-), colon(:).

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_TARGET_PASSWORD
Message.Value: Invalid target password. The string length must be 1 to {0}. And the characters allowed in the string are a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and, dot(.), hyphen(-), colon(:).

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_LUN
Message.Value: Invalid LUN value. The LUN must be specified in decimal or hexadecimal with a leading 0x.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_LU_NAME
Message.Value: LU name length must be 0 to {0}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_MEDIA_INDEX_NUMBER
Message.Value: Invalid Ident Number value.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_MEDIA_NAME
Message.Value: Media Name length must be 0 to {0}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_FILE_NAME
Message.Value: File Name length must be 0 to {0}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_QUEUE_WAIT_TIME
Message.Value: Invalid Queue Wait Time must be {0} to {1}.

Message.Name: MSG_INVALID_MEMBUFFER_BYTES_COUNT
Message.Value: Bytes Count must be 0 to 18446744073709551615.

Message.Name: MSG_CONFIGURATION_MODIFIER
Message.Value: All changes will be discarded. Continue?

Message.Name: MSG_ABOUT
Message.Value: Haruka Software Storage. GUI Client version {0}.{1}.{2}
